snippet: A Pakistani immigrant was sentenced to five years in prison on Thursday by a federal judge after pleading guilty to taking part in a plot to kill a Swedish artist.
abstract: Pakistani immigrant Mohammad Hassan Khalid is sentenced to five years in prison by federal judge after pleading guilty to taking part in plot to kill Swedish artist Lars Vilks; is youngest person convicted of terror charges in United States.
lead_paragraph: A Pakistani immigrant was sentenced to five years in prison on Thursday by a federal judge after pleading guilty to taking part in a plot to kill a Swedish artist.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Young Immigrant Gets 5 Years in ‘Jihad Jane’ Conspiracy
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Young Immigrant Gets 5 Years in ‘Jihad Jane’ Conspiracy
